MergeXmlFilesView.Title: XML Multi-module File Merging
MergeXmlFilesView.Description: Integrate XML language files, suitable for multi-module programs, such as programs using Prism. Please backup files before merging.
MergeXmlFilesView.InputMergedXmlFileName: Please enter the file name of the merged XML language file
MergeXmlFilesView.NoLanguageFilesContent: Please select the language directory first and then perform the merge
MergeXmlFilesView.WrongNewXmlFileNameTitle: Wrong New XML Language File Name
MergeXmlFilesView.WrongNewXmlFileNameContent: The input file name needs to meet the file name format
MergeXmlFilesView.MergeXmlFilesExceptionTitle: Exception in Merging XML Language Files
MergeXmlFilesView.MergeXmlFilesExceptionContent: Please check whether the content of the existing XML language files is valid: {0}
MergeXmlFilesView.ReadXmlFilesExceptionTitle: Exception in Reading XML Language Files
MergeXmlFilesView.ReadXmlFilesExceptionContent: Please check whether the content of the XML language files is valid: {0}

ManageXmlFilesView.Title: XML Multilingual Management
ManageXmlFilesView.Description: Centralize the management and maintenance of XML multilingual data.
